caption.title: Temperature sums (°C) for the continental (1974–2014; crosses) and oceanic (1967–2014; triangles) sites.
caption.p: Points show temperature sums measured each year at both sites. Regression lines are plotted from linear models of the continental (dashed line: r 2 = 0.149, P = 0.007, n = 41) and oceanic (dotted line: r 2 = 0.340, P<0.001, n = 48) site data.
